dialogueTree.title: Conceptualization: "Paintbrush -- check, heavy fuel oil..."
dialogueTree.text: Paintbrush -- check, heavy fuel oil -- check... Now the only thing left to do is paint the wall.

dialogueTree.title: Conceptualization: "The paintbrush in your hand is like..."
dialogueTree.text: The paintbrush in your hand is like a loaded revolver. What will it be, desperado? Quite a few things come to mind...

links.title: You: ""FUCK THE POLICE""
links.text: "FUCK THE POLICE"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant looks at the wall in..."
links.text: The lieutenant looks at the wall in dismay:

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""But we *are* the police...""
links.text: "But we *are* the police..."

links.title: You: ""Yeah -- fuck us.""
links.text: "Yeah -- fuck us."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""But why? We work twelve-hour shift..."
links.text: "But why? We work twelve-hour shifts. We get shot at, spat on..."

links.title: Rhetoric: "Hah! Maybe there's a *reason* for t..."
links.text: Hah! Maybe there's a *reason* for that!

links.title: You: ""But what do we work on? KEEPING EV..."
links.text: "But what do we work on? KEEPING EVERYTHING THE WAY IT IS."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Hmh..." Just a hum. No reply."
links.text: "Hmh..." Just a hum. No reply.

links.title: You: "Keep it to yourself."
links.text: Keep it to yourself.

links.title: Conceptualization: "You've spoken. The wall will now si..."
links.text: You've spoken. The wall will now silently repeat the message -- for a decade or so, until the sea air degrades the paint.

links.title: You: ""You're right, you're right. Is it..."
links.text: "You're right, you're right. Is it too late to change it?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant raises his eyebrows,..."
links.text: The lieutenant raises his eyebrows, then sighs.

links.title: Conceptualization: "The wall towers over you with its i..."
links.text: The wall towers over you with its indelible message.

links.title: Conceptualization: "You've spoken. The wall will now si..."
links.text: You've spoken. The wall will now silently repeat the message. For a decade or so, until the sea air degrades the paint, adding another layer of *detritus* to the city.

links.title: You: ""I LOVE YOU CUNO""
links.text: "I LOVE YOU CUNO"

links.title: Conceptualization: "You've spoken. The wall will now si..."
links.text: You've spoken. The wall will now silently repeat the message. For a decade or so, until the sea air degrades the paint, adding another layer of *detritus* to the city.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Very poetic." The lieutenant nods..."
links.text: "Very poetic." The lieutenant nods in appreciation -- it doesn't sound sincere. "Real poetry. Should we return to our murder investigation? I hear there's a really *bad* one we're supposed to solve."

links.title: You: ""MOTHER OF ALL WALLS""
links.text: "MOTHER OF ALL WALLS"

links.title: You: ""WHAT SHADOW LIES THERE, BENEATH TH..."
links.text: "WHAT SHADOW LIES THERE, BENEATH THE BRIGHT GLEAM"

links.title: You: "(Draw a 3,500 year old pictogram of..."
links.text: (Draw a 3,500 year old pictogram of a human being.)

links.title: You: ""RENE LIVES!""
links.text: "RENE LIVES!"

links.title: You: ""SOMETHING BEAUTIFUL IS GOING TO HA..."
links.text: "SOMETHING BEAUTIFUL IS GOING TO HAPPEN"

links.title: You: ""NO PARKING""
links.text: "NO PARKING"

links.title: You: "Let the wall remain blank. For now...."
links.text: Let the wall remain blank. For now. [Leave.]
